text: The Renfro Hotel, located on S. Dixie Ave. in Park City, Kentucky, was built in 1903. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983. It is a brick and wood building built by Schyler Renfro, the owner. It became the Fishback Hotel in 1928 and in 1940 it became a school for boys. title: Renfro Hotel
